on 4/17/03 11:12 AM, Midas Shannon at midasshannon@... wrote:

> I am very offended by the this email being sent in for

> missleading and should never have been allowed to be

There's no control over what gets sent to the list. Unless someone wants to
volunteer to preread and then approve or disapprove every single email that
passes through here! ;-)

It only happens once in a long while. Just click delete.

Joyce
Unschooling-dotcom moderator
